attributes.action: bring more help for teenagers who runaway then dont get anymore help and then in result run away again
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i am 14 years old and have ranaway so many times ive lost count i would like people to give us more support i know when the police find us they drop us off and we do it again im in care now but still runaway people need to understand social can help to were we live but then thats it really.
i felt unsupported and still do i dont think people relise how many people run away and why you need to solve the problem to stop it from happening again not just bringing them back again then not sloving it in result its a nasty circle.
